definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

pinyin: shi4 jian4 xiang1 guan1 dian4 wei4

sentences.english: Baclofen was more effective in inhibiting field potentials than GABA.
sentences.chinese: 繼而，左旋巴氯芬抑制場電位作用強於GABA。

sentences.english: When wrist flexion simulated, the frequency of action potential waveform of median and ulnar nerve was higher.
sentences.chinese: 模擬腕屈時以正中神經和尺神經電位頻率略高。

sentences.english: What type of electrode pairs should be used for the potentiometric titration with silver nitrate?
sentences.chinese: 水溶液銀量法電位滴定中採用的電極系統是什麼？

sentences.english: The wiper of the potentiometer is connected directly to the spindle.
sentences.chinese: 電位計的孤刷直接與銷子連接。

sentences.english: A continuously variable potentiometer is connected into the detector bridge network.
sentences.chinese: 在檢測器橋路中，接有可調電位器。

sentences.english: Stiring makes the solution potential move negatively.
sentences.chinese: 溶液的攪拌會使溶液電位負移。

sentences.english: Sound transmission in middle ear and microphonic potential.
sentences.chinese: 中耳傳音功能和微音器電位。

sentences.english: The plasticizer has obvious influence on the potential response and membrane conductivity of the electrode.
sentences.chinese: 增塑劑對電極的電位響應及膜電導有明顯的影響。

sentences.english: RP3 on sampling signal panel is secondary sampling signal adjusted potentiometer.
sentences.chinese: 取樣信號板上RP3爲二次電流取樣訊號調整電位器。

sentences.english: Potential variation of rust preventing oil film after its degradation was studied by using wire beam electrode.
sentences.chinese: 採用絲束電極研究防鏽油膜失效之前的電位變化。

sentences.english: It is well established that the cardial contraction is initiated when an action potential depolarizes the sarcolemma.
sentences.chinese: 已經確證，心肌收縮始於動作電位使肌膜去極化。

sentences.english: This mode is equivalent to a potentiometer that is adjusted to the required setting.
sentences.chinese: 這種模式相當於是調整到所需的設置電位計。

sentences.english: Double-point potentiometric titration was used to determine ranitidine hydrochloride and its capsules.
sentences.chinese: 採用酸鹼雙點電位滴定法測定鹽酸雷尼替丁含量。

sentences.english: The differential potentiometric stripping analysis at silver microelectrodes is reported.
sentences.chinese: 本文首次報道了銀微電極微分電位溶出分析法。

sentences.english: Electrolyzed oxidizing water (EOW) has been regarded as a new sanitizer in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 酸性氧化電位水是近年來應運而生的一種新型消毒劑。

sentences.english: Its color can be quickly changed with applied potential.
sentences.chinese: 聚硫堇是一種藍色物質，它的顏色能隨電位迅速變化。

definition: ājñā or ajna, the brow or third eye chakra 查克拉, residing in the forehead/also written 眉間輪|眉间轮[mei2 jian1 lun2]
body palpation (diagnostic method in TCM)/tactile examination
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]

pinyin: bo2 qi3 gong1 neng2 zhang4 ai4
